snippets.tooltip: Confirm tests are testing what was intended
snippets.message: All tests passed, can you confirm the tests are testing what you intended to test?

snippets.tooltip: Check if ready to commit and update plan
snippets.message: Great! Does the code look good for committing (I can generate the commit messages)? Can you update the plan first? What will be next?

snippets.tooltip: Check if ready to commit, update plan and git mv
snippets.message: Great! Does the code look good for committing (I can generate the commit messages)? Can you update the plan first? Please give me the git mv command to mark the plan as done.
